org.lwes.serializer
Class Serializer

java.lang.Object
  org.lwes.serializer.Serializer

public class Serializer
extends Object

This contains low level type serialization used by the rest of the system.

Author:
Anthony Molinaro

serializeIPADDR

public static int serializeIPADDR(IPAddress anIPAddress,
                                  byte[] bytes,
                                  int offset)
Deprecated. 

Serialize IPAddress in *reverse* network order. Don't use this.

Parameters:
anIPAddress - the ip address to serialize
bytes - the byte array to modify
offset - what index in the array to start at
Returns:
how many bytes were set in the array

serializeIPADDR

public static int serializeIPADDR(InetAddress anIPAddress,
                                  byte[] bytes,
                                  int offset)
Deprecated. 

Serializes an ip address in *reverse* network order. Don't use this.

Parameters:
anIPAddress - the ip address to serialize
bytes - the byte array to modify
offset - what index in the array to start at
Returns:
how many bytes were set in the array

ip - the ip address to serialize
bytes - the byte array to modify
offset - what index in the array to start at
Returns:
how many bytes were set in the array
